description.raw:
Introduce new variable LINUX_DISTRO, default to ubuntu. Support for debian distributions inside docker.

Two different kind of jobs are created from this DSL:

 * pkg_builder: changes in the debian git, try to build the package and run lintian checker.
 * install: once a week try to install debian packages to check that are ok.
description.html:
Introduce new variable LINUX_DISTRO, default to ubuntu. Support for debian distributions inside docker.

Two different kind of jobs are created from this DSL:

  • pkg_builder: changes in the debian git, try to build the package and run lintian checker.
  • install: once a week try to install debian packages to check that are ok.

title.raw: DSL: debian scripts to help with maintenance of packages
